text: Dughiar kam, kɨ Judan gumazamizir mabar gari, me Sabatɨn dughiabar wainɨn ovɨziba dɨkava, da mɨrmɨra wainɨn dɨpaba isi. Ezɨ Judan igharaziba dagheba ko wainɨn dɨpaba, wainɨn ovɨziba, fighɨn ovɨziba, ko bizir igharazir maba sara donkibagh arigha, da inigha Jerusalemɨn izi. Ezɨ Sabatɨn dughiamɨn kɨ pamtemɨn me mɨgɨa ghaze, “Sabatɨn dughiamɨn, gumazamiziba bar bizibagh ivezan markiam. Kɨ arazir kamɨn bar ian anogoroke.”
